Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided. ``` 
``` 
intros Y X f ll n m H.
unfold map in H.
rewrite map_app in H.
apply map_eq_app in H as [l1 [l2 [H1 [H2 H3]]]].
exists l1.
exists l2.
split. 
- rewrite <- app_assoc_reverse in H1. exact H1.
- split.
  + exact H2.
  + exact H3.
```
